item.title: From Le Labo to La Mer, the Top 40 Picks from Nordstrom’s Anniversary Sale
item.description: After browsing the full catalog of discounted finds, here are the skin care, makeup, hair care, fragrance and beauty device standouts from the department store’s annual savings event.
